pre_caption: The video opens with a full, overhead shot, positioning the camera directly above a man lying on a table in the center of the frame. The black and white checkered floor occupies the background, while meandering, glowing orange lines are superimposed in the foreground. The camera then executes a shaky upward crane in an arc, causing the entire scene to rotate and become upside down. During this transition, a second, shirtless man is revealed at the bottom of the frame, standing on the floor which is now positioned at the top of the screen. The checkered floor is in the background at the top of the frame, with light-colored walls and framed pictures visible in the middle ground. The glowing orange lines remain as a stationary effect in the foreground throughout the shot.
